Some time before 1356 DR, Ubergast observed that the informal handwriting in the untitled wizards workbook known traditionally as Briels Book of Shadows matched that in a letter from Briel stating his plan to found a school of wizardry in Baldurs Gate, preserved in the citys archive. This supported the supposed authorship of the book.
